key_points: Rosanne Boyland's brother-in-law blames Trump for the Capitol riot and her death.
Boyland, a Trump supporter from Georgia, died during the U.S. Capitol assault.
Her cause of death was not officially disclosed, but a friend reported she was trampled in the crowd.
Justin Cave, Boyland's brother-in-law, supports invoking the 25th Amendment to remove Trump.
A White House spokesman did not comment on Boyland's death.
Trump encouraged his supporters to come to Washington and "fight" at the Capitol.
Democratic leaders are calling for Trump's removal through the 25th Amendment or impeachment.
Total of four civilians died during the riot, including Boyland.
Ashli Babbitt was shot by Capitol Police, and two men died from medical emergencies.
Capitol Police officer Brian Sicknick also died from injuries sustained during the riot.
